alert.note: Alert for Brown; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BROWN...SOUTHERN MARINETTE AND SOUTHERN OCONTO COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Stephenson to 7 miles north of Oconto to near Pulaski. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Marinette, Oconto, Pulaski, Howard, Suamico, Little Suamico, Peshtigo, Chase, Oconto Falls, and Porterfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
